channel.title: Fight pits 317 delta base!

item.title: Fight pits 317 delta base!
item.dc:creator: @pk_george1 pk george1
item.description:
@pk_george1 wrote:

Hello,

I just wondered if anybody could help me, Im trying to make it so that when theres a certain amount of people left in fight pits the tzahaar monsters will spawm.

if(isInPitsGame() && PlayerHandler.pitsWaitTimer == 20 && inPitsGame){
inPitsGame = true;
server.npcHandler.spawnANPC(3777, 2628, 2591,0);
server.npcHandler.spawnANPC(3778, 2680, 2588,0);
server.npcHandler.spawnANPC(3779, 2669, 2570,0);
server.npcHandler.spawnANPC(3780, 2645, 2569,0);
ResetAttackNPC();
}

That the code so far.

Advise me please.

Read full topic
